attributes.title: Absolutely God Awful
attributes.review:
This App basically ruined my entire life. Not ONLY did I have to stare at my racist, sexist, homophobic, and misogynistic “President” upon opening the app, but they were actually asking me to SUPPORT him. I’m a strong believer that anyone is better than this Cheeto in office, and the fact that others actually support him makes me vomit. So, after opening the app, his face made me start dry heaving and thoughts of him serving a second term sent me into cardiac arrest, which left me in the hospital for weeks. I ALMOST DIED BECAUSE OF THIS APP. When the doctors showed my mom the app that had this effect on me, she had the same reaction but DIED. The medical professionals said that this had happened at least 134,810 times in the past WEEK, solely because of this app. Now, if you’ve been up to date, this is also the number of COVID-19 deaths in the United States, so it will clearly be a plethora of deaths that our president DOESN’T CARE ABOUT. Unbelievable. I mean really, can we stop talking about this app to talk about how Donald Trump doesn’t even care that hundreds of thousands of people are dying in his country and that people that support him are okay with that??? Not to mention he's also allowing police to continue to harm peaceful protesters and arrest/kill innocent POC. In conclusion: not only did this app, but DONALD TRUMP ruined my life. Thanks guys for listening, I highly request taking this app off of the App Store. 

P.S. If I could give it 0 stars, I would.
